h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ pa~ncakkhandhaa ^a^T0.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ -- ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0002^ea^ katamo ruupakkhandho? ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ruupakkhandho.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ruupa.m atiita.m? ya.m ruupa.m atiita.m niruddha.m vigata.m vipari.nata.m attha"ngata.m abbhattha"ngata.m uppajjitvaa vigata.m atiita.m atiita.msena sa"ngahita.m, cattaaro ca mahaabhuutaa catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m atiita.m.

[03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m anaagata.m? ya.m ruupa.m ajaata.m abhuuta.m asa~njaata.m anibbatta.m anabhinibbatta.m apaatubhuuta.m anuppanna.m asamuppanna.m anu.t.thita.m asamu.t.thita.m anaagata.m anaagata.msena sa"ngahita.m, cattaaro ca mahaabhuutaa catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m anaagata.m.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0002^ea^ katama.m ruupa.m paccuppanna.m? ya.m ruupa.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa~njaata.m nibbatta.m abhinibbatta.m paatubhuuta.m uppanna.m ^a^T0.0002^ea^ samuppanna.m u.t.thita.m samu.t.thita.m paccuppanna.m paccuppanna.msena sa"ngahita.m, cattaaro ^a^P0.0002^ea^ ca mahaabhuutaa catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m paccuppanna.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ruupa.m ajjhatta.m? ya.m ruupa.m tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyaka.m paa.tipuggalika.m upaadinna.m, cattaaro ca mahaabhuutaa catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m ajjhatta.m.

[03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m bahiddhaa? ya.m ruupa.m tesa.m tesa.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyaka.m paa.tipuggalika.m upaadinna.m, cattaaro ca mahaabhuutaa catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m bahiddhaa.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0003^ea^ katama.m ruupa.m o.laarika.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m o.laarika.m.
[03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m sukhuma.m? itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro {kaba.li.mkaaro (sii0 syaa0)} aahaaro -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m sukhuma.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ruupa.m hiina.m? ya.m ruupa.m tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m u~n~naata.m ava~n~naata.m hii.lita.m paribhuuta.m acittiikata.m hiina.m hiinamata.m hiinasammata.m ani.t.tha.m akanta.m amanaapa.m, ruupaa saddaa gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m hiina.m.

[03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m pa.niita.m? ya.m ruupa.m tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m anu~n~naata.m anava~n~naata.m ahii.lita.m aparibhuuta.m cittiikata.m pa.niita.m pa.niitamata.m pa.niitasammata.m i.t.tha.m kanta.m manaapa.m, ruupaa saddaa gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m pa.niita.m. ta.m ta.m vaa pana ^a^T0.0003^ea^ ruupa.m upaadaayupaadaaya ruupa.m hiina.m pa.niita.m da.t.thabba.m.
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ruupa.m duure? itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m anaasanne anupaka.t.the duure asantike -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m duure.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0003^ea^ ^a^P0.0003^ea^ katama.m ruupa.m santike? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m aasanne upaka.t.the aviduure santike -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m santike. ta.m ta.m vaa pana ruupa.m upaadaayupaadaaya ruupa.m duure santike da.t.thabba.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vedanaakkhandho? yaa kaaci vedanaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike vaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati vedanaakkhandho.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0004^ea^ katamaa vedanaa atiitaa? yaa vedanaa atiitaa niruddhaa vigataa vipari.nataa attha"ngataa abbhattha"ngataa uppajjitvaa vigataa atiitaa atiita.msena sa"ngahitaa, sukhaa vedanaa dukkhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati vedanaa atiitaa.

[03] tattha katamaa vedanaa anaagataa? yaa vedanaa ajaataa abhuutaa asa~njaataa anibbattaa anabhinibbattaa apaatubhuutaa anuppannaa asamuppannaa anu.t.thitaa asamu.t.thitaa anaagataa anaagata.msena sa"ngahitaa, sukhaa vedanaa dukkhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati vedanaa anaagataa.

[03] tattha katamaa vedanaa paccuppannaa? yaa vedanaa jaataa bhuutaa sa~njaataa ^a^T0.0004^ea^ nibbattaa abhinibbattaa paatubhuutaa uppannaa samuppannaa u.t.thitaa samu.t.thitaa paccuppannaa paccuppanna.msena sa"ngahitaa, sukhaa vedanaa dukkhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati vedanaa paccuppannaa.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa vedanaa ajjhattaa? yaa vedanaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyakaa paa.tipuggalikaa upaadinnaa, sukhaa vedanaa dukkhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati vedanaa ajjhattaa.

[03] tattha katamaa vedanaa bahiddhaa? yaa vedanaa tesa.m tesa.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyakaa paa.tipuggalikaa upaadinnaa, sukhaa vedanaa dukkhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati vedanaa bahiddhaa.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0004^ea^ katamaa vedanaa o.laarikaa sukhumaa? akusalaa vedanaa o.laarikaa, kusalaabyaakataa vedanaa sukhumaa. kusalaakusalaa vedanaa o.laarikaa, abyaakataa vedanaa sukhumaa. dukkhaa ^a^P0.0004^ea^ vedanaa o.laarikaa, sukhaa ca adukkhamasukhaa ca vedanaa sukhumaa. sukhadukkhaa vedanaa o.laarikaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa sukhumaa. asamaapannassa vedanaa o.laarikaa, samaapannassa vedanaa sukhumaa. saasavaa vedanaa o.laarikaa, anaasavaa vedanaa sukhumaa. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vedana.m upaadaayupaadaaya vedanaa o.laarikaa sukhumaa da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0005^ea^ katamaa vedanaa hiinaa pa.niitaa? akusalaa vedanaa hiinaa, kusalaabyaakataa ^a^T0.0005^ea^ vedanaa pa.niitaa. kusalaakusalaa vedanaa hiinaa, abyaakataa vedanaa pa.niitaa. dukkhaa vedanaa hiinaa, sukhaa ca adukkhamasukhaa ca vedanaa pa.niitaa. sukhadukkhaa vedanaa hiinaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa pa.niitaa. asamaapannassa vedanaa hiinaa, samaapannassa vedanaa pa.niitaa. saasavaa vedanaa hiinaa, anaasavaa vedanaa pa.niitaa. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vedana.m upaadaayupaadaaya vedanaa hiinaa pa.niitaa da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa vedanaa duure? akusalaa vedanaa kusalaabyaakataahi vedanaahi duure; kusalaabyaakataa vedanaa akusalaaya vedanaaya duure; kusalaa vedanaa akusalaabyaakataahi vedanaahi duure; akusalaabyaakataa vedanaa kusalaaya vedanaaya duure; abyaakataa vedanaa kusalaakusalaahi vedanaahi duure; kusalaakusalaa vedanaa abyaakataaya vedanaaya duure. dukkhaa vedanaa sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi duure; sukhaa ca adukkhamasukhaa ca vedanaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya duure; sukhaa vedanaa dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi duure; dukkhaa ca adukkhamasukhaa ca vedanaa sukhaaya vedanaaya duure; adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi duure; sukhadukkhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya duure. asamaapannassa vedanaa samaapannassa vedanaaya duure; samaapannassa vedanaa asamaapannassa vedanaaya duure. saasavaa vedanaa anaasavaaya vedanaaya duure; anaasavaa vedanaa saasavaaya vedanaaya duure -- aya.m vuccati vedanaa duure.

[03] tattha katamaa vedanaa santike? akusalaa vedanaa akusalaaya ^a^T0.0006^ea^ vedanaaya santike; kusalaa vedanaa kusalaaya vedanaaya santike; abyaakataa ^a^M0.0005^ea^ vedanaa abyaakataaya vedanaaya santike. dukkhaa vedanaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya santike; sukhaa vedanaa sukhaaya vedanaaya santike; adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya santike ^a^P0.0005^ea^. asamaapannassa vedanaa asamaapannassa vedanaaya santike; samaapannassa vedanaa samaapannassa vedanaaya santike. saasavaa vedanaa saasavaaya vedanaaya santike; anaasavaa vedanaa anaasavaaya vedanaaya santike. aya.m vuccati vedanaa santike. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vedana.m upaadaayupaadaaya vedanaa duure santike da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0006^ea^ katamo sa~n~naakkhandho? yaa kaaci sa~n~naa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike vaa tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naakkhandho.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sa~n~naa atiitaa? yaa sa~n~naa atiitaa niruddhaa vigataa vipari.nataa attha"ngataa abbhattha"ngataa uppajjitvaa vigataa atiitaa atiita.msena sa"ngahitaa, cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa atiitaa.

[03] tattha katamaa sa~n~naa anaagataa? yaa sa~n~naa ajaataa abhuutaa asa~njaataa anibbattaa anabhinibbattaa apaatubhuutaa anuppannaa ^a^T0.0007^ea^ asamuppannaa anu.t.thitaa asamu.t.thitaa anaagataa anaagata.msena sa"ngahitaa, cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa anaagataa.

[03] tattha katamaa sa~n~naa paccuppannaa? yaa sa~n~naa jaataa bhuutaa sa~njaataa nibbattaa abhinibbattaa paatubhuutaa uppannaa samuppannaa u.t.thitaa samu.t.thitaa paccuppannaa paccuppanna.msena sa"ngahitaa, cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa paccuppannaa.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0006^ea^ katamaa sa~n~naa ajjhattaa? yaa sa~n~naa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyakaa paa.tipuggalikaa upaadinnaa, cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa ajjhattaa.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0007^ea^ katamaa sa~n~naa bahiddhaa? yaa sa~n~naa tesa.m tesa.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyakaa paa.tipuggalikaa upaadinnaa, cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa bahiddhaa.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0006^ea^ katamaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa sukhumaa? pa.tighasamphassajaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, adhivacanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. akusalaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, kusalaabyaakataa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. kusalaakusalaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, abyaakataa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa ^a^T0.0008^ea^, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. asamaapannassa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, samaapannassa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. saasavaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, anaasavaa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. ta.m ta.m vaa pana sa~n~na.m upaadaayupaadaaya sa~n~naa o.laarikaa sukhumaa da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sa~n~naa hiinaa pa.niitaa? akusalaa sa~n~naa hiinaa, kusalaabyaakataa sa~n~naa pa.niitaa. kusalaakusalaa sa~n~naa hiinaa, abyaakataa sa~n~naa pa.niitaa. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa hiinaa, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa pa.niitaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa hiinaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa pa.niitaa. asamaapannassa sa~n~naa hiinaa, samaapannassa sa~n~naa pa.niitaa. saasavaa sa~n~naa hiinaa, anaasavaa sa~n~naa pa.niitaa. ta.m ta.m vaa pana sa~n~na.m upaadaayupaadaaya sa~n~naa hiinaa pa.niitaa da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sa~n~naa duure? akusalaa sa~n~naa kusalaabyaakataahi sa~n~naahi duure; kusalaabyaakataa sa~n~naa akusalaaya sa~n~naaya ^a^M0.0007^ea^ duure; kusalaa sa~n~naa akusalaabyaakataahi sa~n~naahi duure; akusalaabyaakataa sa~n~naa kusalaaya sa~n~naaya duure. abyaakataa sa~n~naa kusalaakusalaahi sa~n~naahi duure; kusalaakusalaa sa~n~naa abyaakataaya sa~n~naaya duure. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^T0.0009^ea^ ca vedanaahi sampayuttaahi sa~n~naahi duure; sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya ^a^V0.0008^ea^ sa~n~naaya duure; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaahi sa~n~naahi duure; dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya duure; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaahi sa~n~naahi duure; sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya duure. asamaapannassa sa~n~naa samaapannassa sa~n~naaya duure; samaapannassa ^a^P0.0007^ea^ sa~n~naa asamaapannassa sa~n~naaya duure. saasavaa sa~n~naa anaasavaaya sa~n~naaya duure; anaasavaa sa~n~naa saasavaaya sa~n~naaya duure -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa duure.

[03] tattha katamaa sa~n~naa santike? akusalaa sa~n~naa akusalaaya sa~n~naaya santike; kusalaa sa~n~naa kusalaaya sa~n~naaya santike; abyaakataa sa~n~naa abyaakataaya sa~n~naaya santike. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya santike; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya santike; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya santike. asamaapannassa sa~n~naa asamaapannassa sa~n~naaya santike; samaapannassa sa~n~naa samaapannassa sa~n~naaya santike. saasavaa sa~n~naa ^a^T0.0010^ea^ saasavaaya sa~n~naaya santike; anaasavaa sa~n~naa anaasavaaya sa~n~naaya santike. aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa santike. ta.m ta.m vaa pana sa~n~na.m upaadaayupaadaaya sa~n~naa duure santike da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo sa"nkhaarakkhandho? ye keci sa"nkhaaraa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa ^a^M0.0008^ea^ vaa pa.niitaa vaa ye duure santike vaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati sa"nkhaarakkhandho.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa atiitaa? ye sa"nkhaaraa atiitaa niruddhaa vigataa vipari.nataa attha"ngataa abbhattha"ngataa uppajjitvaa vigataa atiitaa atiita.msena sa"ngahitaa, cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa ^a^V0.0009^ea^ sotasamphassajaa cetanaa ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa manosamphassajaa cetanaa -- ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa atiitaa.

[03] tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa anaagataa? ye sa"nkhaaraa ajaataa abhuutaa asa~njaataa anibbattaa anabhinibbattaa apaatubhuutaa anuppannaa asamuppannaa anu.t.thitaa asamu.t.thitaa anaagataa anaagata.msena sa"ngahitaa, cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa sotasamphassajaa cetanaa ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa manosamphassajaa cetanaa -- ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa anaagataa.

[03] tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa paccuppannaa? ye sa"nkhaaraa jaataa bhuutaa sa~njaataa nibbattaa abhinibbattaa paatubhuutaa uppannaa samuppannaa u.t.thitaa samu.t.thitaa paccuppannaa ^a^P0.0008^ea^ paccuppanna.msena sa"ngahitaa, cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa sotasamphassajaa cetanaa ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa manosamphassajaa ^a^T0.0011^ea^ cetanaa -- ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa paccuppannaa.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa ajjhattaa? ye sa"nkhaaraa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyakaa paa.tipuggalikaa upaadinnaa, cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa sotasamphassajaa cetanaa ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa manosamphassajaa cetanaa -- ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa ajjhattaa.

[03] tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa bahiddhaa? ye sa"nkhaaraa tesa.m tesa.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyakaa paa.tipuggalikaa upaadinnaa, cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa sotasamphassajaa cetanaa ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa manosamphassajaa cetanaa -- ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa bahiddhaa.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0009^ea^ katame sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa sukhumaa? akusalaa sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa, kusalaabyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa sukhumaa. kusalaakusalaa sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa, abyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa sukhumaa. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi ^a^V0.0010^ea^ sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhumaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhumaa. asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa, samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa sukhumaa. saasavaa sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa, anaasavaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhumaa. te te vaa pana sa"nkhaare upaadaayupaadaaya sa"nkhaaraa o.laarikaa sukhumaa da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa pa.niitaa? akusalaa sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa, kusalaabyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa pa.niitaa. kusalaakusalaa sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa, abyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa pa.niitaa. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa ^a^T0.0012^ea^, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa pa.niitaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa pa.niitaa. asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa, samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa pa.niitaa. saasavaa sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa, anaasavaa sa"nkhaaraa pa.niitaa. te te vaa pana sa"nkhaare upaadaayupaadaaya sa"nkhaaraa hiinaa pa.niitaa da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa duure? akusalaa sa"nkhaaraa kusalaabyaakatehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; kusalaabyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa akusalehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; kusalaa sa"nkhaaraa akusalaabyaakatehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; akusalaabyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa kusalehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; abyaakataa ^a^P0.0009^ea^ sa"nkhaaraa kusalaakusalehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; kusalaakusalaa sa"nkhaaraa abyaakatehi sa"nkhaarehi duure. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^M0.0010^ea^ vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure ^a^T0.0013^ea^. asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa samaapannassa sa"nkhaarehi duure; samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa asamaapannassa sa"nkhaarehi duure. saasavaa sa"nkhaaraa anaasavehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; anaasavaa sa"nkhaaraa saasavehi sa"nkhaarehi duure. ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa duure.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0011^ea^ katame sa"nkhaaraa santike? akusalaa sa"nkhaaraa akusalaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; kusalaa sa"nkhaaraa kusalaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; abyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa abyaakataana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. saasavaa sa"nkhaaraa saasavaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; anaasavaa sa"nkhaaraa anaasavaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa santike. te te vaa pana sa"nkhaare upaadaayupaadaaya sa"nkhaaraa duure santike da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vi~n~naa.nakkhandho? ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0014^ea^ katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m? ya.m ^a^P0.0010^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m niruddha.m vigata.m vipari.nata.m attha"ngata.m abbhattha"ngata.m uppajjitvaa vigata.m atiita.m atiita.msena sa"ngahita.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m.

[03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m anaagata.m? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m ajaata.m abhuuta.m asa~njaata.m anibbatta.m anabhinibbatta.m apaatubhuuta.m anuppanna.m asamuppanna.m anu.t.thita.m asamu.t.thita.m ^a^M0.0011^ea^ anaagata.m anaagata.msena sa"ngahita.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m anaagata.m.

[03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m paccuppanna.m? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa~njaata.m nibbatta.m abhinibbatta.m paatubhuuta.m uppanna.m samuppanna.m u.t.thita.m samu.t.thita.m paccuppanna.m paccuppanna.msena sa"ngahita.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V0.0012^ea^ sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m paccuppanna.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m ajjhatta.m? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyaka.m paa.tipuggalika.m upaadinna.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m ajjhatta.m.

[03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m bahiddhaa? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m tesa.m tesa.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyaka.m paa.tipuggalika.m upaadinna.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m bahiddhaa.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m sukhuma.m? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m, kusalaabyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa sukhumaa. kusalaakusalaa vi~n~naa.naa o.laarikaa ^a^T0.0015^ea^, abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa sukhumaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa o.laarikaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m. asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m, samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m. saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m, anaasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaayupaadaaya vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m sukhuma.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m pa.niita.m? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, kusalaabyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa pa.niitaa ^a^P0.0011^ea^. kusalaakusalaa vi~n~naa.naa hiinaa, abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m pa.niita.m. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa pa.niitaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa hiinaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ^a^M0.0012^ea^ sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m pa.niita.m. asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m pa.niita.m. saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, anaasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m pa.niita.m. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaayupaadaaya vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m pa.niita.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0013^ea^ katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m duure? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m kusalaabyaakatehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; kusalaabyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa akusalaa vi~n~naa.naa duure; kusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m akusalaabyaakatehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; akusalaabyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa kusalaa vi~n~naa.naa duure; abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m kusalaakusalehi ^a^T0.0016^ea^ vi~n~naa.nehi duure; kusalaakusalaa vi~n~naa.naa abyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa duure. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa duure; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa duure; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa duure. asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m samaapannassa vi~n~naa.naa duure; samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.naa duure. saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m anaasavaa vi~n~naa.naa duure; anaasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m saasavaa vi~n~naa.naa duure -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m duure.

[03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m santike? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m akusalassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; kusala.m ^a^P0.0012^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m kusalassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m abyaakatassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m ^a^T0.0017^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike. asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m samaapannassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike. saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m saasavassa vi~n~naa.nassa ^a^M0.0013^ea^ santike; anaasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m anaasavassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m santike. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaayupaadaaya vi~n~naa.na.m duure santike da.t.thabba.m.
[06] suttantabhaajaniiya.m.
[03] 32^b^.^eb^ pa~ncakkhandhaa ^a^V0.0014^ea^ -- ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo ruupakkhandho? ekavidhena ruupakkhandho -- sabba.m ruupa.m na hetu, ahetuka.m, hetuvippayutta.m, sappaccaya.m, sa"nkhata.m, ruupa.m, lokiya.m, saasava.m, sa.myojaniya.m, ganthaniya.m, oghaniya.m, yoganiya.m, niivara.niya.m, paraama.t.tha.m, upaadaaniya.m, sa.mkilesika.m, abyaakata.m, anaaramma.na.m, acetasika.m, cittavippayutta.m, nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamma.m, asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesika.m, na savitakkasavicaara.m, na avitakkavicaaramatta.m, avitakkaavicaara.m, na piitisahagata.m, na sukhasahagata.m, na upekkhaasahagata.m, neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m, neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m, nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii, nevasekkhanaasekkha.m, paritta.m, kaamaavacara.m, na ruupaavacara.m, na aruupaavacara.m, pariyaapanna.m, no apariyaapanna.m, aniyata.m, aniyyaanika.m, uppanna.m, chahi vi~n~naa.nehi ^a^T0.0018^ea^ vi~n~neyya.m, anicca.m, jaraabhibhuuta.m. eva.m ekavidhena ruupakkhandho.

[03] duvidhena ^a^P0.0013^ea^ ruupakkhandho -- atthi ruupa.m upaadaa, atthi ruupa.m no upaadaa {nupaadaa (sii0 ka0)}. atthi ruupa.m upaadinna.m, atthi ruupa.m anupaadinna.m. atthi ruupa.m upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi ruupa.m anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. atthi ruupa.m sanidassana.m, atthi ruupa.m anidassana.m. atthi ruupa.m sappa.tigha.m, atthi ruupa.m appa.tigha.m. atthi ruupa.m indriya.m, atthi ruupa.m na indriya.m. atthi ruupa.m mahaabhuuta.m, atthi ruupa.m na mahaabhuuta.m. atthi ruupa.m vi~n~natti, atthi ruupa.m na vi~n~natti. atthi ruupa.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m, atthi ruupa.m na cittasamu.t.thaana.m. atthi ruupa.m cittasahabhu, atthi ruupa.m na cittasahabhu. atthi ruupa.m cittaanuparivatti, atthi ruupa.m na ^a^M0.0014^ea^ cittaanuparivatti. atthi ruupa.m ajjhattika.m, atthi ruupa.m baahira.m. atthi ruupa.m o.laarika.m, atthi ruupa.m sukhuma.m. atthi ruupa.m duure, atthi ruupa.m santike...pe0... atthi ruupa.m kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, atthi ruupa.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. eva.m duvidhena ruupakkhandho.
[03] (yathaa ^a^V0.0015^ea^ ruupaka.n.de vibhatta.m, tathaa idha vibhajitabba.m.)

[03] tividhena ruupakkhandho -- ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m upaadaa, ya.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ta.m atthi upaadaa, atthi no upaadaa. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m upaadinna.m, ya.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ta.m atthi upaadinna.m, atthi anupaadinna.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, ya.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ta.m atthi upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m...pe0... ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, ya.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ta.m ^a^T0.0019^ea^ atthi kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, atthi na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. eva.m tividhena ruupakkhandho.

[03] catubbidhena ruupakkhandho -- ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m atthi upaadinna.m, atthi anupaadinna.m; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi upaadinna.m, atthi anupaadinna.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m atthi upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m atthi sappa.tigha.m, atthi appa.tigha.m; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi sappa.tigha.m, atthi appa.tigha.m ^a^P0.0014^ea^. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m atthi o.laarika.m, atthi sukhuma.m; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi o.laarika.m, atthi sukhuma.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m atthi duure, atthi santike; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi duure, atthi santike...pe0... di.t.tha.m, suta.m, muta.m, vi~n~naata.m ruupa.m. eva.m catubbidhena ruupakkhandho.
[03] pa~ncavidhena ruupakkhandho -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, ya~nca ruupa.m upaadaa. eva.m pa~ncavidhena ruupakkhandho.

[03] chabbidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, sotavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, ghaanavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, jivhaavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, kaayavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manovi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m. eva.m chabbidhena ruupakkhandho.

[03] sattavidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, sotavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, ghaanavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, jivhaavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, kaayavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manodhaatuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m. eva.m sattavidhena ruupakkhandho ^a^T0.0020^ea^.

[03] a.t.thavidhena ^a^M0.0015^ea^ ^a^V0.0016^ea^ ruupakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, sotavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, ghaanavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, jivhaavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, kaayavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m atthi sukhasamphassa.m, atthi dukkhasamphassa.m, manodhaatuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m. eva.m a.t.thavidhena ruupakkhandho.

[03] navavidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, itthindriya.m, purisindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, ya~nca ruupa.m na indriya.m. eva.m navavidhena ruupakkhandho.

[03] dasavidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, itthindriya.m, purisindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, na indriya.m ruupa.m atthi sappa.tigha.m, atthi appa.tigha.m. eva.m dasavidhena ruupakkhandho.

[03] ekaadasavidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, ya~nca ruupa.m anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m. eva.m ekaadasavidhena ruupakkhandho.
[06] aya.m vuccati ruupakkhandho.

[03] ruupakkhandho neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. ruupakkhandho neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. ruupakkhandho nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aacayagaamino, siyaa apacayagaamino, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. ruupakkhandho nevasekkhanaasekkho. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa, siyaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa. ruupakkhandho paritto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa parittaa, siyaa mahaggataa, siyaa appamaa.naa. ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa parittaaramma.naa, siyaa mahaggataaramma.naa, siyaa appamaa.naaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``parittaaramma.naa''tipi ^a^P0.0063^ea^, ``mahaggataaramma.naa''tipi, ``appamaa.naaramma.naa''tipi. ruupakkhandho majjhimo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa hiinaa, siyaa majjhimaa, siyaa pa.niitaa. ruupakkhandho aniyato ^a^M0.0061^ea^. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa micchattaniyataa, siyaa sammattaniyataa, siyaa aniyataa.

[03] ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa maggaaramma.naa, siyaa maggahetukaa, siyaa maggaadhipatino, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi ^a^T0.0073^ea^, ``maggaadhipatino''tipi; siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino; siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa atiitaaramma.naa, siyaa anaagataaramma.naa, siyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi, ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi; siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ajjhattaaramma.naa''tipi, ``bahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi, ``ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi. cattaaro khandhaa anidassanaappa.tighaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa sanidassanasappa.tigho, siyaa anidassanasappa.tigho, siyaa anidassanaappa.tigho.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ cattaaro ^a^V0.0070^ea^ khandhaa na hetuu. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa hetu, siyaa na hetu. ruupakkhandho ahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sahetukaa, siyaa ahetukaa. ruupakkhandho hetuvippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa hetusampayuttaa, siyaa hetuvippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``hetu ceva sahetuko caa''tipi, ``sahetuko ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva sahetukaa caa''ti, siyaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa hetu ceva sahetuko ca, siyaa ^a^T0.0074^ea^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``hetu ceva sahetuko caa''tipi, ``sahetuko ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutto caa''tipi, ``hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, siyaa hetusampayutto ceva na ^a^M0.0062^ea^ ca hetu, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutto caa''tipi, ``hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. ruupakkhandho na hetu ahetuko ^a^P0.0064^ea^. tayo khandhaa siyaa na hetuu sahetukaa, siyaa na hetuu ahetukaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa na hetu sahetuko, siyaa na hetu ahetuko, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``na hetu sahetuko''tipi, ``na hetu ahetuko''tipi.
[06] sappaccayaa, sa"nkhataa.

[03] cattaaro khandhaa anidassanaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa sanidassano, siyaa anidassano. cattaaro khandhaa appa.tighaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa sappa.tigho, siyaa appa.tigho. ruupakkhandho ruupa.m. cattaaro khandhaa aruupaa. ruupakkhandho lokiyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa; kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.

[03] cattaaro khandhaa no aasavaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa aasavo, siyaa no aasavo. ruupakkhandho saasavo. cattaaro khandhaa ^a^T0.0075^ea^ siyaa saasavaa, siyaa anaasavaa. ruupakkhandho aasavavippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aasavasampayuttaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho ^a^V0.0071^ea^ na vattabbo -- ``aasavo ceva saasavo caa''ti, saasavo ceva no ca aasavo. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa caa''ti, siyaa saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa aasavo ceva saasavo ca, siyaa saasavo ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``aasavo ceva saasavo caa''tipi, ``saasavo ceva no ca aasavo''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayutto ceva no ca aasavo''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto ca, siyaa aasavasampayutto ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayutto ceva no ca aasavo''tipi. ruupakkhandho aasavavippayuttasaasavo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa, siyaa ^a^M0.0063^ea^ na vattabbaa -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasavaa''tipi, ``aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa''tipi.

[03] cattaaro khandhaa no sa.myojanaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa sa.myojana.m, siyaa no sa.myojana.m. ruupakkhandho sa.myojaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa ^a^T0.0076^ea^ siyaa sa.myojaniyaa, siyaa asa.myojaniyaa. ruupakkhandho sa.myojanavippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyo caa''ti, ``sa.myojaniyo ceva no ca sa.myojana.m''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojaniyaa ceva ^a^P0.0065^ea^ no ca sa.myojanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyo ca, siyaa sa.myojaniyo ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyo caa''tipi, ``sa.myojaniyo ceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutto caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayutto ceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutto ca, siyaa sa.myojanasampayutto ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutto ^a^V0.0072^ea^ caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayutto ceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. ruupakkhandho sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa na ^a^T0.0077^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa''tipi, ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa''tipi.

[03] cattaaro khandhaa no ganthaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa gantho, siyaa no gantho. ruupakkhandho ganthaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa ganthaniyaa, siyaa aganthaniyaa. ruupakkhandho ganthavippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa ganthasampayuttaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``gantho ceva ganthaniyo caa''ti, ``ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa ^a^M0.0064^ea^ -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca, siyaa ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``gantho ceva ganthaniyo caa''tipi, ``ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutto caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca, siyaa ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutto caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho''ti pi. ruupakkhandho ganthavippayuttaganthaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa ^a^T0.0078^ea^, siyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa''tipi, ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa''tipi.

[03] cattaaro khandhaa no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no ^a^P0.0066^ea^ niivara.naa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa niivara.na.m, siyaa no niivara.na.m. ruupakkhandho niivara.niyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa niivara.niyaa, siyaa aniivara.niyaa. ruupakkhandho niivara.navippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyo caa''ti, ``niivara.niyo ceva no ca niivara.na.m''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.niyaa caa''ti, siyaa niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyo ^a^V0.0073^ea^ ca, siyaa niivara.niyo ceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyo caa''tipi, ``niivara.niyo ceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutto caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayutto ceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutto ca, siyaa niivara.nasampayutto ceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutto caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayutto ceva no ^a^M0.0065^ea^ ca niivara.na''ntipi. ruupakkhandho ^a^T0.0079^ea^ niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa''tipi, ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa''tipi.

[03] cattaaro khandhaa no paraamaasaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa paraamaaso, siyaa no paraamaaso. ruupakkhandho paraama.t.tho. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa paraama.t.thaa, siyaa aparaama.t.thaa. ruupakkhandho paraamaasavippayutto. tayo khandhaa siyaa paraamaasasampayuttaa, siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa paraamaasasampayutto, siyaa paraamaasavippayutto, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``paraamaasasampayutto''tipi, ``paraamaasavippayutto''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tho caa''ti, ``paraama.t.tho ceva no ca paraamaaso''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''ti, siyaa paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tho ca, siyaa paraama.t.tho ceva no ca paraamaaso, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tho caa''tipi, ``paraama.t.tho ceva no ca paraamaaso''tipi. ruupakkhandho paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.tho. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa, siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa ^a^P0.0067^ea^, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa''tipi, ``paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa''tipi.

[03] ruupakkhandho ^a^T0.0080^ea^ anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa saaramma.naa. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho citta.m. cattaaro khandhaa no cittaa. tayo khandhaa cetasikaa. dve khandhaa acetasikaa. tayo khandhaa cittasampayuttaa ^a^V0.0074^ea^. ruupakkhandho cittavippayutto. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``cittena sampayutto''tipi, ``cittena vippayutto''tipi. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thaa. ruupakkhandho cittavisa.msa.t.tho. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``cittena sa.msa.t.tho''tipi, ``cittena visa.msa.t.tho''tipi. tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho no cittasamu.t.thaano. ruupakkhandho siyaa cittasamu.t.thaano, siyaa no cittasamu.t.thaano. tayo khandhaa cittasahabhuno. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho no cittasahabhuu. ruupakkhandho siyaa cittasahabhuu, siyaa no cittasahabhuu. tayo khandhaa cittaanuparivattino. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho no cittaanuparivatti. ruupakkhandho ^a^M0.0066^ea^ siyaa cittaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittaanuparivatti. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. dve khandhaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. dve khandhaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino. dve khandhaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino.

[03] vi~n~naa.nakkhandho ajjhattiko. tayo khandhaa baahiraa. ruupakkhandho siyaa ajjhattiko, siyaa baahiro. cattaaro khandhaa no upaadaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa upaadaa, siyaa no upaadaa, siyaa upaadinnaa, siyaa anupaadinnaa. cattaaro ^a^T0.0081^ea^ khandhaa no upaadaanaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa upaadaana.m, siyaa no upaadaana.m. ruupakkhandho upaadaaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa upaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadaaniyaa. ruupakkhandho upaadaanavippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa, siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyo caa''ti, ``upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaana.m''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyo ca, siyaa upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyo caa''tipi, ``upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutto ^a^P0.0068^ea^ caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutto ca, siyaa upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``upaadaana~nceva ^a^V0.0075^ea^ upaadaanasampayutto caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi. ruupakkhandho upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa, siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa ^a^T0.0082^ea^, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa''tipi, ``upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa''tipi.

[03] cattaaro khandhaa no kilesaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa kileso, siyaa no kileso. ruupakkhandho sa.mkilesiko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.mkilesikaa ^a^M0.0067^ea^, siyaa asa.mkilesikaa. ruupakkhandho asa.mkili.t.tho. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaa. ruupakkhandho kilesavippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kilesasampayuttaa, siyaa kilesavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkilesiko caa''ti, ``sa.mkilesiko ceva no ca kileso''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa kileso ceva sa.mkilesiko ca, siyaa sa.mkilesiko ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkilesiko caa''tipi, ``sa.mkilesiko ceva no ca kileso''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tho caa''tipi, ``sa.mkili.t.tho ceva no ^a^T0.0083^ea^ ca kileso''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tho ca, siyaa sa.mkili.t.tho ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tho caa''tipi, ``sa.mkili.t.tho ceva no ca kileso''tipi.

[03] ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva kilesasampayutto caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca, siyaa kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva kilesasampayutto caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso''tipi. ruupakkhandho kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesiko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa ^a^P0.0069^ea^, siyaa ^a^V0.0076^ea^ kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa''tipi, ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa''tipi.

[03] ruupakkhandho na dassanena pahaatabbo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbaa. ruupakkhandho na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo ^a^M0.0068^ea^. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. ruupakkhandho na dassanena pahaatabbahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa. ruupakkhandho na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. ruupakkhandho avitakko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa savitakkaa, siyaa avitakkaa. ruupakkhandho avicaaro. cattaaro ^a^T0.0084^ea^ khandhaa siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. ruupakkhandho appiitiko, cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. ruupakkhandho na piitisahagato. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. dve khandhaa na sukhasahagataa. tayo khandhaa siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa na sukhasahagataa. dve khandhaa na upekkhaasahagataa. tayo khandhaa siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ dvaadasaayatanaani ^a^V0.0078^ea^ -- cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, manaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m cakkhaayatana.m? ya.m cakkhu {cakkhu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka0) dha0 sa0 596-599} catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yena cakkhunaa ^a^P0.0071^ea^ anidassanena sappa.tighena ruupa.m sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m passi vaa passati vaa passissati vaa passe vaa, cakkhumpeta.m cakkhaayatanampeta.m cakkhudhaatupesaa cakkhundriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m nettampeta.m nayanampeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m vuccati ``cakkhaayatana.m'' ^a^T0.0086^ea^.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0070^ea^ katama.m sotaayatana.m? ya.m sota.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yena sotena anidassanena sappa.tighena sadda.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m su.ni vaa su.naati vaa su.nissati vaa su.ne vaa, sotampeta.m sotaayatanampeta.m sotadhaatupesaa sotindriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m vuccati ``sotaayatana.m''.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ghaanaayatana.m? ya.m ghaana.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yena ghaanena anidassanena sappa.tighena gandha.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m ghaayi vaa ghaayati vaa ghaayissati vaa ghaaye vaa, ghaanampeta.m ghaanaayatanampeta.m ghaanadhaatupesaa ghaanindriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m vuccati ``ghaanaayatana.m''.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m jivhaayatana.m? yaa jivhaa catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yaaya jivhaaya anidassanaaya sappa.tighaaya rasa.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m saayi vaa saayati vaa saayissati vaa saaye vaa, jivhaapesaa jivhaayatanampeta.m ^a^V0.0079^ea^ jivhaadhaatupesaa jiivhindriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m vuccati ``jivhaayatana.m''.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0071^ea^ katama.m manaayatana.m? ekavidhena manaayatana.m -- phassasampayutta.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0072^ea^ katama.m ruupaayatana.m? ya.m ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m niila.m piitaka.m lohitaka.m {piita.m lohita.m (sii0)} odaata.m kaa.laka.m ma~nji.t.thaka.m {ma~nje.t.thaka.m (sii0 syaa0)} hari hariva.n.na.m amba"nkurava.n.na.m diigha.m rassa.m a.nu.m thuula.m va.t.ta.m parima.n.dala.m caturassa.m cha.la.msa.m a.t.tha.msa.m so.lasa.msa.m ninna.m thala.m chaayaa aatapo aaloko andhakaaro abbhaa mahikaa dhuumo rajo candama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa suuriyama.n.dalassa {suriyama.n.dalassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} va.n.nanibhaa taarakaruupaana.m va.n.nanibhaa aadaasama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa ma.nisa"nkhamuttave.luriyassa va.n.nanibhaa jaataruuparajatassa va.n.nanibhaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m, ya.m ruupa.m sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m cakkhunaa anidassanena sappa.tighena passi vaa passati vaa passissati vaa passe vaa, ruupampeta.m ruupaayatanampeta.m ruupadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati ``ruupaayatana.m''.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0081^ea^ katama.m saddaayatana.m? yo saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho bherisaddo mudi"ngasaddo {muti"ngasaddho (sii0)} sa"nkhasaddo pa.navasaddo giitasaddo vaaditasaddo sammasaddo paa.nisaddo sattaana.m nigghosasaddo dhaatuuna.m sannighaatasaddo vaatasaddo udakasaddo manussasaddo amanussasaddo, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m sadda.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m sotena anidassanena sappa.tighena su.ni vaa su.naati vaa su.nissati vaa su.ne vaa, saddopeso saddaayatanampeta.m saddadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati ``saddaayatana.m''.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m gandhaayatana.m? yo gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho muulagandho saaragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho aamagandho vissagandho sugandho duggandho, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho ^a^M0.0073^ea^, ya.m gandha.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m ghaanena anidassanena sappa.tighena ghaayi vaa ghaayati vaa ghaayissati vaa ghaaye vaa, gandhopeso gandhaayatanampeta.m gandhadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati ``gandhaayatana.m''.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m rasaayatana.m? yo raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambila.m madhura.m tittaka.m ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m {lapilaka.m (sii0), lampika.m (ka0 sii0)} khaarika.m lambika.m kasaavo saadu asaadu, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m rasa.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m jivhaaya anidassanaaya sappa.tighaaya saayi vaa saayati vaa saayissati vaa saaye vaa, rasopeso rasaayatanampeta.m rasadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati ``rasaayatana.m''.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ dasaayatanaa abyaakataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi. manaayatana.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya ^a^M0.0075^ea^ sampayutta.m, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi. dasaayatanaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.

[03] pa~ncaayatanaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. saddaayatana.m ^a^T0.0088^ea^ anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. cattaaro aayatanaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadaaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. dasaayatanaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. dasaayatanaa avitakkaavicaaraa. manaayatana.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m, siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m, siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m ^a^V0.0084^ea^, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``savitakkasavicaara''ntipi, ``avitakkavicaaramatta''ntipi, ``avitakkaavicaara''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi, ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi. dvaayatanaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa ^a^P0.0074^ea^ sukhasahagataa, siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi, ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi.

[03] dasaayatanaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dasaayatanaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. dasaayatanaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. dvaayatanaa siyaa aacayagaamino, siyaa apacayagaamino, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. dasaayatanaa ^a^T0.0089^ea^ nevasekkhanaasekkhaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa ^a^M0.0076^ea^, siyaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa. dasaayatanaa parittaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa parittaa, siyaa mahaggataa, siyaa appamaa.naa. dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa parittaaramma.naa, siyaa mahaggataaramma.naa, siyaa appamaa.naaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``parittaaramma.naa''tipi, ``mahaggataaramma.naa''tipi, ``appamaa.naaramma.naa''tipi. dasaayatanaa majjhimaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa hiinaa, siyaa majjhimaa, siyaa pa.niitaa. dasaayatanaa aniyataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa micchattaniyataa, siyaa sammattaniyataa, siyaa aniyataa.

[03] dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa maggaaramma.naa, siyaa maggahetukaa, siyaa maggaadhipatino, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi, ``maggaadhipatino''tipi. pa~ncaayatanaa siyaa uppannaa, siyaa uppaadino, na vattabbaa -- ``anuppannaa''ti. saddaayatana.m siyaa uppanna.m, siyaa anuppanna.m, na vattabba.m -- ``uppaadii''ti. pa~ncaayatanaa siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino. dhammaayatana.m siyaa uppanna.m, siyaa anuppanna.m, siyaa uppaadi, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``uppanna''ntipi, ``anuppanna''ntipi, ``uppaadii''tipi. ekaadasaayatanaa siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa atiita.m, siyaa anaagata.m, siyaa paccuppanna.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``atiita''ntipi, ``anaagata''ntipi, ``paccuppanna''ntipi. dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ^a^V0.0085^ea^ atiitaaramma.naa, siyaa anaagataaramma.naa ^a^T0.0090^ea^, siyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa ^a^P0.0075^ea^ -- ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi, ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi; siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ajjhattaaramma.naa''tipi, ``bahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi, ``ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi. ruupaayatana.m sanidassanasappa.tigha.m. navaayatanaa anidassanasappa.tighaa. dvaayatanaa anidassanaappa.tighaa.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ekaadasaayatanaa na hetuu. dhammaayatana.m siyaa hetu, siyaa na hetu. dasaayatanaa ahetukaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sahetukaa, siyaa ahetukaa. dasaayatanaa hetuvippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa hetusampayuttaa, siyaa hetuvippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ^a^M0.0077^ea^ ceva sahetukaa caa''tipi, ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva sahetuka~ncaa''ti, siyaa sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sahetuka~nceva na ca hetuu''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa hetu ceva sahetuka~nca, siyaa sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva sahetuka~ncaa''tipi, ``sahetuka~nceva na ca hetuu''tipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa hetusampayutta~nceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``hetusampayutta~nceva na ^a^T0.0091^ea^ ca hetuu''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa hetu ceva hetusampayutta~nca, siyaa hetusampayutta~nceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``hetusampayutta~nceva na ca hetuu''tipi. dasaayatanaa na hetuuahetukaa. manaayatana.m siyaa na hetusahetuka.m, siyaa na hetuahetuka.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa na hetusahetuka.m, siyaa na hetuahetuka.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``na hetusahetuka''ntipi, ``na hetuahetuka''ntipi.

[03] ekaadasaayatanaa sappaccayaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sappaccaya.m, siyaa appaccaya.m. ekaadasaayatanaa sa"nkhataa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sa"nkhata.m, siyaa asa"nkhata.m. ruupaayatana.m sanidassana.m. ekaadasaayatanaa ^a^V0.0086^ea^ anidassanaa. dasaayatanaa ^a^P0.0076^ea^ sappa.tighaa. dvaayatanaa appa.tighaa. dasaayatanaa ruupaa. manaayatana.m aruupa.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa ruupa.m, siyaa aruupa.m. dasaayatanaa lokiyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa; kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.

[03] ekaadasaayatanaa no aasavaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa aasavo, siyaa no aasavo. dasaayatanaa saasavaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa saasavaa, siyaa anaasavaa. dasaayatanaa aasavavippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa aasavasampayuttaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa caa''ti, ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva saasava~ncaa''ti, siyaa saasava~nceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``saasava~nceva no ca aasavo''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa aasavo ceva saasava~nca, siyaa saasava~nceva no ca ^a^M0.0078^ea^ aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva saasava~ncaa''tipi, ``saasava~nceva no ca aasavo''tipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa ^a^T0.0092^ea^ aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~nca, siyaa aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo''tipi. dasaayatanaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasavaa''tipi, ``aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa''tipi.

[03] ekaadasaayatanaa no sa.myojanaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sa.myojana.m, siyaa no sa.myojana.m. dasaayatanaa sa.myojaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.myojaniyaa, siyaa asa.myojaniyaa. dasaayatanaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojaniyaa caa''ti, sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniya~ncaa''ti, siyaa sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana''nti. dhammaayatana.m ^a^T0.0093^ea^ siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniya~nca, siyaa sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva ^a^V0.0087^ea^ sa.myojaniya''ntipi, ``sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''tipi. manaayatana.m ^a^P0.0077^ea^ na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana''nti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~nca, siyaa sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. dasaayatanaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa ^a^M0.0079^ea^. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa''tipi, ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa''tipi.

[03] ekaadasaayatanaa no ganthaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa gantho, siyaa no gantho. dasaayatanaa ganthaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ganthaniyaa, siyaa aganthaniyaa. dasaayatanaa ganthavippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ganthasampayuttaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthaniyaa caa''ti, ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m ^a^T0.0094^ea^ -- ``gantho ceva ganthaniya~ncaa''ti, siyaa ganthaniya~nceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``ganthaniya~nceva no ca gantho''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa gantho ceva ganthaniya~nca, siyaa ganthaniya~nceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva ganthaniya~ncaa''tipi, ``ganthaniya~nceva no ca gantho''tipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~nca, siyaa ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho''tipi. dasaayatanaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa''tipi, ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa''tipi.

[03] ekaadasaayatanaa no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no niivara.naa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa ^a^V0.0088^ea^ niivara.na.m, siyaa no niivara.na.m. dasaayatanaa niivara.niyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ^a^P0.0078^ea^ niivara.niyaa, siyaa aniivara.niyaa. dasaayatanaa niivara.navippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.niyaa caa''ti, niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niya~ncaa''ti ^a^T0.0095^ea^, siyaa niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na''nti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.niya~nca, siyaa niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa ^a^M0.0080^ea^ na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niya~ncaa''tipi, ``niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no ca niivara.na''nti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~nca, siyaa niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. dasaayatanaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa''tipi, ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa''tipi.

[03] ekaadasaayatanaa no paraamaasaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa paraamaaso, siyaa no paraamaaso. dasaayatanaa paraama.t.thaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa paraama.t.thaa, siyaa aparaama.t.thaa. dasaayatanaa paraamaasavippayuttaa. manaayatana.m siyaa paraamaasasampayutta.m, siyaa paraamaasavippayutta.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa paraamaasasampayutta.m, siyaa paraamaasavippayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaasasampayutta''ntipi, ``paraamaasavippayutta''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na ^a^T0.0096^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''ti, ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa''. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~ncaa''ti, siyaa paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~nca, siyaa paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~ncaa''tipi, ``paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso''tipi. dasaayatanaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa ^a^V0.0089^ea^, siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa''tipi ^a^P0.0079^ea^, ``paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa''tipi.

[03] dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. manaayatana.m saaramma.na.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa saaramma.na.m, siyaa anaaramma.na.m. manaayatana.m citta.m. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittaa. ekaadasaayatanaa acetasikaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cetasika.m, siyaa acetasika.m. dasaayatanaa cittavippayuttaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasampayutta.m, siyaa cittavippayutta.m. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``cittena sampayutta''ntipi ^a^M0.0081^ea^, ``cittena vippayutta''ntipi. dasaayatanaa cittavisa.msa.t.thaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.tha.m, siyaa cittavisa.msa.t.tha.m. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``cittena sa.msa.t.tha''ntipi, ``cittena visa.msa.t.tha''ntipi. chaayatanaa no cittasamu.t.thaanaa. chaayatanaa siyaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa, siyaa no cittasamu.t.thaanaa. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittasahabhuno. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasahabhuu ^a^T0.0097^ea^, siyaa no cittasahabhuu. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittaanuparivattino. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittaanuparivatti. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ cha ^a^M0.0084^ea^ ^a^P0.0082^ea^ ^a^V0.0092^ea^ dhaatuyo -- pathaviidhaatu {pa.thaviidhaatu (sii0 syaa0) evamuparipi}, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa pathaviidhaatu? pathaviidhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi baahiraa. tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m kakkha.labhaavo ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0)} a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m {a.t.thimi~njaa (sii0)} vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m kakkha.labhaavo ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu'.

[03] tattha katamaa baahiraa pathaviidhaatu? ya.m baahira.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m kakkha.labhaavo bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m, seyyathida.m ^a^T0.0102^ea^ -- ayo loha.m tipu siisa.m sajjha.m {sajjhu (syaa0)} muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohita"nko {lohita"ngo (syaa0 ka0), lohitako (?)} masaaragalla.m ti.na.m ka.t.tha.m sakkharaa ka.thala.m {kathala.m (ka0)} bhuumi paasaa.no pabbato, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi baahira.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m kakkha.labhaavo bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `baahiraa pathaviidhaatu'. yaa ca ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ``pathaviidhaatu''.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0083^ea^ ^a^V0.0093^ea^ katamaa aapodhaatu? aapodhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi baahiraa. tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m {sneho snehagata.m (syaa0)} bandhanatta.m ruupassa ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m ^a^M0.0085^ea^ paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m bandhanatta.m ruupassa ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu'.

[03] tattha katamaa baahiraa aapodhaatu? ya.m baahira.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m bandhanatta.m ruupassa bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso khiira.m dadhi sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m bhummaani vaa udakaani antalikkhaani vaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi baahira.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m bandhanatta.m ruupassa bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m ^a^T0.0103^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati `baahiraa aapodhaatu'. yaa ca ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aapodhaatu, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ``aapodhaatu''.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa tejodhaatu? tejodhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi baahiraa. tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m usmaa usmaagata.m usuma.m usumagata.m ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- yena ca santappati yena ca jiiriiyati yena ca pari.dayhati yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m usmaa usmaagata.m usuma.m usumagata.m ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu'.

[03] tattha katamaa baahiraa tejodhaatu? ya.m baahira.m tejo tejogata.m usmaa usmaagata.m usuma.m usumagata.m bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- ka.t.thaggi palaalaggi {sakalikaggi (sabbattha)} ti.naggi gomayaggi thusaggi sa"nkaaraggi indaggi aggisantaapo suuriyasantaapo ka.t.thasannicayasantaapo ti.nasannicayasantaapo dha~n~nasannicayasantaapo bha.n.dasannicayasantaapo, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi baahira.m tejo tejogata.m usmaa usmaagata.m usuma.m usumagata.m bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `baahiraa tejodhaatu'. yaa ^a^P0.0084^ea^ ^a^V0.0094^ea^ ca ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ``tejodhaatu''.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa aakaasadhaatu? aakaasadhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi baahiraa. tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu? ya.m ^a^T0.0105^ea^ ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaaso aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m vivaro vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m ma.msalohitehi ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- ka.n.nacchidda.m naasacchidda.m mukhadvaara.m, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m ajjhoharati, yattha ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m santi.t.thati, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m adhobhaaga.m nikkhamati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaaso aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m vivaro vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m ma.msalohitehi ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu'.

[03] tattha katamaa nekkhammadhaatu? nekkhammapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko...pe0... sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m vuccati ``nekkhammadhaatu''. sabbepi kusalaa dhammaa ``nekkhammadhaatu''.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0089^ea^ katamaa abyaapaadadhaatu? abyaapaadapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko...pe0... sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m vuccati ``abyaapaadadhaatu''. yaa sattesu metti mettaayanaa mettaayitatta.m mettaacetovimutti -- aya.m vuccati ``abyaapaadadhaatu''.

[03] tattha katamaa ghaanadhaatu? ya.m ^a^P0.0088^ea^ ghaana.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0... su~n~no gaamopeso -- aya.m vuccati ``ghaanadhaatu''.

[03] tattha katamaa dhammadhaatu? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, ya~nca ruupa.m anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m, asa"nkhataa ca dhaatu.

[03] tattha katamo vedanaakkhandho? ekavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- phassasampayutto ^a^T0.0111^ea^. duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko. tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0... eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho...pe0... eva.m bahuvidhena vedanaakkhandho. aya.m vuccati ``vedanaakkhandho''.

[03] tattha katamaa asa"nkhataa dhaatu? raagakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo -- aya.m vuccati ``asa"nkhataa dhaatu''. aya.m vuccati ``dhammadhaatu''.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ so.lasa ^a^M0.0093^ea^ dhaatuyo abyaakataa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. dasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi. pa~nca dhaatuyo ^a^V0.0102^ea^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa ^a^T0.0113^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi.
